org.cojen.tupl.io

Class AttributedFileFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cojen.tupl.io.AttributedFileFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileFactory

    public class AttributedFileFactory
extends Object
implements FileFactory
    Applies file attributes to newly created files and directories.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AttributedFileFactory(FileAttribute<?>[] fileAttrs, FileAttribute<?>[] dirAttrs) 
      AttributedFileFactory(String posixFilePerms, String posixDirPerms) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean createDirectories(File dir)
      Create the given directory path for read/write access, unless the directory path already exists.
      boolean createDirectory(File dir)
      Create the given directory for read/write access, unless the directory already exists.
      boolean createFile(File file)
      Create the given file for read/write access, unless the file already exists.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AttributedFileFactory

        public AttributedFileFactory(String posixFilePerms,
                             String posixDirPerms)
        Parameters:
        posixFilePerms - permissions to apply to newly created files (ignored if null)
        posixDirPerms - permissions to apply to newly created directories (ignored if null)

      • AttributedFileFactory

        public AttributedFileFactory(FileAttribute<?>[] fileAttrs,
                             FileAttribute<?>[] dirAttrs)
        Parameters:
        fileAttrs - attributes to apply to newly created files (ignored if null)
        dirAttrs - attributes to apply to newly created directories (ignored if null)
